verbose_text: In the presence of folic acid or the co-expression of transgenic Folr1, AC is rescued in MDCK cells that express Shroom3 R1838C (XREF_FIG C, F, G; Fig. S1A-B) and the mean ABAR is significantly decreased relative to non transfected cells (0.69 and 0.65, respectively) (XREF_FIG G, XREF_TABLE).
